title: Guys, A question for riot and ppl's
body:
Hi,

So you know how in aram you can spend some rp to temporarily unlock skins for everyone on your team? I was wondering if that could be brought into other game modes.

I, personally, would love to be able to do it. It'd be fun I think ^^ Just wondering, anyone else interested? Or has this been discussed before. I apologise if it has.

replies.body:
well it seems fun, first time i tried it i was disappointed. Cuz using a skin for one match makes u want it more :( I dont have that much money. Then again i did it to get the ip boost that comes with it.
Sorry bout spelling :)

No worries, I can understand you easily ^^ But I spend my money on rp (more then I should :c) and rather then buying a skin, I'd love to just give my team a skin for a game. It's cheap, I could do it often, and it'd be fun.

I understand how playing a skin could make you want it more, but that just furthers my case >:) But seriously, I don't see any real negatives from adding it to all game-modes. Might even be the opposite, and make people more positive :)
